name: kafka-connect-record-expander
description: A Kafka Connect SMT that expands records with key, headers, and metadata fields.
author: BlackPoint Cyber

includeKey.description: Include the Kafka record key in the expanded value.

includeHeaders.description: Include Kafka record headers in the expanded value.

includeMetadata.description: Include topic, partition, and timestamp metadata in the expanded value.

serializeValueAsJson.description: Serialize the record value as a JSON string instead of embedding it.

keyFieldName.description: The field name to use for the record key.

valueFieldName.description: The field name to use for the record value.

headersFieldName.description: The field name to use for Kafka headers.
